data.actual_result: User avatars and status indicators shrink more with each time you change the size of the drawer
data.expected_result: User avatars and status indicators stay the same size
data.short_description: User avatars and status indicators shrink in the mention drawer when repeatedly changing the size
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel where multiple users have sent messages - Open the mention drawer, and type some letters that will shrink the drawer but not close it - Delete the letters you typed and observe the mention drawer - Repeatedly do this multiple times in a row and observe the user avatars and status indicators as you do so
